TEXT: High school girls band from Shimokitazawa. NL Build up Groove and coordinate among teammates to perform the perfect live!.
NL You grip your guitar, bass, and drumsticks in your hands...

Navigating an unlit street, you come across several hooded figures in the midst of some dark ritual. As you approach, they turn to you in eerie unison. The tallest among them bares fanged teeth and extends a long, pale hand towards you. NL ~"Join~ ~us~ ~sis,~ ~and~ ~feel~ ~the~ ~warmth~ ~of~ ~the~ ~Spire."~
